mapper.insert: insert into ${regionName} (SIGUNGU, BUNGI, BONBUN, BUBUN, APARTMENTNAME,AREAFOREXCLUSIVEUSE,DEALYEARMONTH,DEALDAY,DEALAMOUNT,APARTMENTDONG,FLOOR,BUYERGBN,SELLERGBN,BUILDYEAR,ROADNAME,CANCLEDEALDAY,REQGBN,RDEALERLAWDNM,REGISTRATIONDATE,SGGCD) values ( #{aptTransactionDto.SIGUNGU}, #{aptTransactionDto.BUNGI}, #{aptTransactionDto.BONBUN}, #{aptTransactionDto.BUBUN}, #{aptTransactionDto.APARTMENTNAME}, #{aptTransactionDto.AREAFOREXCLUSIVEUSE}, #{aptTransactionDto.DEALYEARMONTH}, #{aptTransactionDto.DEALDAY}, #{aptTransactionDto.DEALAMOUNT}, #{aptTransactionDto.APARTMENTDONG}, #{aptTransactionDto.FLOOR}, #{aptTransactionDto.BUYERGBN}, #{aptTransactionDto.SELLERGBN}, #{aptTransactionDto.BUILDYEAR}, #{aptTransactionDto.ROADNAME}, #{aptTransactionDto.CANCLEDEALDAY}, #{aptTransactionDto.REQGBN}, #{aptTransactionDto.RDEALERLAWDNM}, #{aptTransactionDto.REGISTRATIONDATE}, #{aptTransactionDto.SGGCD} )
